Corso and Shipware have joined forces to help merchants streamline their shipping efforts + provide peace of mind to consumers.
Schedule A Demo
Description
Corso is proud to announce a new strategic partnership with Shipware, a leading shipping logistics company that provides expertise and technology to help businesses reduce shipping costs.
‚Äç
The partnership will also provide Corso customers with access to Shipware‚Äôs parcel and LTL auditing services, third party warehousing, and modal optimization services. This will allow customers to identify cost savings opportunities across their shipping operations, make sure that carrier invoices are accurate, and reduce their shipping costs, respectively.
  With Shipware‚Äôs parcel audit services & software, Shipware claims all eligible refunds for UPS, FedEx and LTL shipments and credits them directly back to your carrier account. When combined with Corso, your brand has the ability to capitalize on costly carrier mistakes and generate revenue
Reduce your company‚Äôs shipping costs up to 40%
Reduce transit times to help improve customer satisfaction
Transform your shipping and logistics operations into a profit center
‚ÄúCorso coupled with Shipware‚Äôs robust offering will unlock opportunities for DTC brands to capitalize on what is otherwise a frustrating & costly situation with carriers.
Nate Usher
CEO, Corso
An Elevated Experience
Add Corso to your store for a new revenue stream that eliminates old post-purchase costs and delivers the best customer experiences. Let‚Äôs Grow!

On this page
Overview
Shopify Checkout Extensions
Corso Shipping Protection is available as a Shopify Checkout UI extension, making it easier than ever for brands to offer their customers peace of mind and a more sustainable shipping experience.
What is Shopify Checkout Extensions?
Checkout extensions are a powerful tool that can be used to improve the checkout experience for Shopify brands and their customers. By adding custom content and functionality to their checkout pages, brands can increase conversion rates and boost sales. Checkout UI extensions are easy to install and use, and they can be customized to match the look and feel of any Shopify store.
Benefits of Corso‚Äôs Checkout Extension:
There are many benefits to using Corso‚Äôs Checkout Extension, including:
Easy to implement
Native look and feel within Shopify‚Äôs Checkout UI Extensibility
Dynamic widget adjusts text color based on background to ensure ADA compliance
Requirement from Shopify - Get ahead of the game
Corso Shipping Protection in Checkout - This provides several benefits including:
Increased conversion rates: Corso Green Shipping can help to increase conversion rates by providing customers with peace of mind and a more convenient checkout experience.
Improved customer satisfaction: Corso Green Shipping can help to improve customer satisfaction by providing customers with a more sustainable shipping option.
Reduced shipping costs: Corso Green Shipping can help to reduce shipping costs by providing merchants with access to a network of sustainable carriers.
Increased brand awareness: Corso Green Shipping can help to increase brand awareness by positioning merchants as leaders in sustainability.
Corso Shipping Protection is now available in Shopify Checkout Extensions
Corso‚Äôs Checkout Extension adds shipping protection to your Shopify checkout. As an extension built into Shopify‚Äôs ecosystem, you‚Äôll be able to add Corso Shipping Protection to checkout, adjust the location to wherever you like and customize the widget to match your brand.
How to Implement Checkout Extensions
To implement Checkout Extensions, follow these steps:
Log into your Shopify store
Go to Settings
Go to Checkout
See path below that applies to you:
If you have not updated to Checkout Extensibility, click ‚ÄòCreate draft checkout‚Äô
If you have already updated to Checkout Extensibility, click ‚ÄòCustomize‚Äô
Click Add app towards bottom
Select Corso Checkout Extension app
Corso‚Äôs Extension will be placed in the default location within Express Checkout
Move to the desired location by dragging and dropping ‚ÄòCorso Checkout Extension on the left menu
We recommend placing the widget in Express Checkout or Contact Shipping. This is because anything in the Order Summary section will be hidden in a drop-down on mobile view
Customize your shipping protection widget to match your brand by changing the accent color in ‚ÄòBranding
You‚Äôll notice that the widget is dynamic and will adjust its text colors according to the background color of your sites checkout page (ensures ADA compliance)
Congrats! You now have Corso Shipping Protection implemented in Checkout Extensions!
Conclusion
Shopify Checkout Extensions are a great way to customize the checkout experience for your customers. Corso Shipping Protection is an extension that adds shipping protection to any Shopify checkout that has been updated to extensibility.
Overall, Corso Green Shipping is a valuable addition to Shopify‚Äôs new Checkout UI Extensions. The service can help merchants to increase conversion rates, improve customer satisfaction, reduce shipping costs, and increase brand awareness.
